name: Lucy and the Gem Dungeon
description:
Web embed version controller setup:

KeyboardGame Boy ControllerArrow KeysD-PadZB ButtonXA ButtonEnterStartShiftSelect

This is my GBJAM 9 entry, made using GB Studio 2!. I've never participated in a game jam before, so this is rather exciting!

In this game, you play as Lucy, a witch who has ventured into an abandoned dungeon seeking magical gems. Of course, the dungeon is filled with danger, so this won't be easy!
